name: Space Pew Pew Pew (PPP)
description:
Space PPP is a cooperative space shooter in which players must in a limited time destroy as many enemy ships as possible.

DETAILS

Developer(s) : Team 13, ArtFX Montpellier

Release : December 2018

Game plateform : PC

Genre : Space Shooter, Cooperation 

Language : French

PEGI 3

INPUTS

Keybord (1 player) : 

ZQSD = move / A = Shoot / E = pose a mine

2 Xbox Controllers (2 players) : 

Left Joystick = move / A = shoot / X = pose a mine 

CREDITS

Lorène HUE - Game Design, Scripter, Graphism

Noah AMAT -  Scripter

Sarah TESTARDO - 2D Artist

Vincent MEDEIROS - 3D Artist, FX 

Corentin ZIMMMERMANN - 3D Artist, FX

Axel SOMSY - Scripter

Download & install instructions :

1 - Unzip the folder

2 - Optionnal: plug 2 xbox 360 controller or xboxone controller

3 - Launch SpacePPP.exe

4 - Enjoy & comment!
